name: Mike Santos
text: He is a UP law product. That is why i'm puzzled by his proposal to include drug pushing as a ground. The consti provisions have limited this power because of historical abuse (as explained by our prof).    And yes, it is a mouthful! Hahaha I've been corrected myself.
